// src/pages/MoviePage.js
import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MoviePage=()=>{const[movie,setMovie]=useState(null);const{id}=useParams();const API_KEY='40395510edcd99a28d89af43cb5e07b8';const movieDetailsUrl="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(id,"?api_key=").concat(API_KEY);const baseImageUrl="https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500";useEffect(()=>{const fetchMovie=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get(movieDetailsUrl);setMovie(response.data);}catch(err){console.error("Erreur lors de la récupération des détails du film :",err);}};fetchMovie();},[movieDetailsUrl]);if(!movie){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Chargement..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-detail-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-poster",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(baseImageUrl).concat(movie.poster_path),alt:movie.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-info-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Date de sortie :"})," ",movie.release_date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Note :"})," ",movie.vote_average.toFixed(1),"/10"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Synopsis"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:movie.overview}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>window.history.back(),children:"Retour"})]})]});};export default MoviePage;
